name: uk-trains-mcp
description: MCP server for UK train information including National Rail and Transport for London data
author: Assistant

mcp.name: UK Trains
mcp.description: Get real-time UK train information including departures, arrivals, delays, and disruptions

tools.name: get_train_departures
tools.description: Get real-time train departure information from a UK station

station.description: Station code or name (e.g., 'LDS' for Leeds, 'PAD' for Paddington)

destination.description: Optional destination station code or name

tools.name: get_train_arrivals
tools.description: Get real-time train arrival information at a UK station

origin.description: Optional origin station code or name

tools.name: get_train_journey
tools.description: Plan a train journey between two UK stations

date.description: Journey date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: today)

time.description: Departure time in HH:MM format (default: now)

tools.name: get_train_delays
tools.description: Get information about current train delays and disruptions

route.description: Optional route or line name to filter delays

tools.name: get_tfl_status
tools.description: Get Transport for London service status including Underground, Overground, and DLR

tools.name: search_stations
tools.description: Search for UK train stations by name or partial name

query.description: Station name or partial name to search for

examples.title: Check departures from Leeds
examples.description: Get the next 10 train departures from Leeds station
examples.prompt: What trains are departing from Leeds in the next hour?

examples.title: Plan journey to London
examples.description: Plan a train journey from Manchester to London
examples.prompt: How can I get from Manchester to London by train tomorrow morning?

examples.title: Check TfL status
examples.description: Check the status of London Underground services
examples.prompt: Are there any delays on the London Underground today?

examples.title: Find station information
examples.prompt: What's the station code for Edinburgh Waverley?
